headline.print_headline: Rolling Stone Says Problems With Fraternity Rape Story Were Its Fault
headline.main: Rolling Stone Says Problems With Fraternity Rape Story Were Its Fault

lead_paragraph: Rolling Stone magazine has revised a letter to readers regarding a November article about an alleged gang rape at a University of Virginia fraternity, taking responsibility for problems with its story and saying they were not the fault of the alleged victim.
